dict.string: Enter the password for “%@” in System Preferences.
Enter the Facebook password for “%@” in Settings.
You will receive a text message containing a temporary code. Please use this code instead of your password to sign in.
Your account has been blocked for suspicious activity. Please log in to facebook.com from your computer and follow the instructions given.
Could not communicate with the server.
There is no connection to the Internet.
The user name or password is incorrect.
You need to verify your email address before you can start using your Facebook account.
You cannot sign in from your iPhone since you have opted out of Facebook Platform.
